pages.text: The Cleansing Crystal can produce $(l:utils/cleansing_reagent)Cleansing Reagents$(/l) at the cost of 10% potential, and 1 $(l:reagents/basic_reagent)Basic Reagent$(/l) while in the "Cleansing Reagent" mode.

pages.title: Crafting Recipe
pages.text: The Cleansing Crystal is made simply with quartz and any type of crystal.
